28 namespace bitpit {
29 
48 template<class DerivedElement>
49 ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::ElementHalfItem(DerivedElement &element, ConstProxyVector<long> &&connectivity, Winding winding)
50  : m_element(element), m_connect(std::move(connectivity)), m_winding(winding)
51 {
52  // Find the vertex with the lowest id, this will be used as first vertex
53  // when iterating over the connectivity.
54  std::size_t connectSize = m_connect.size();
55 
56  m_connectBegin = 0;
57  if (connectSize > 0) {
58  long smallestVertexId = m_connect[m_connectBegin];
59  for (std::size_t i = 1; i < connectSize; ++i) {
60  long vertexId = m_connect[i];
61  if (vertexId < smallestVertexId) {
62  m_connectBegin = i;
63  smallestVertexId = vertexId;
64  }
65  }
66  }
67 }
68 
74 template<class DerivedElement>
75 DerivedElement & ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::getElement() const
76 {
77  return m_element;
78 }
79 
85 template<class DerivedElement>
86 const ConstProxyVector<long> & ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::getConnect() const
87 {
88  return m_connect;
89 }
90 
96 template<class DerivedElement>
97 typename ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::Winding ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::getWinding() const
98 {
99  return m_winding;
100 }
101 
107 template<class DerivedElement>
108 void ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::setWinding(Winding winding)
109 {
110  m_winding = winding;
111 }
112 
120 template<class DerivedElement>
121 bool ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::operator==(const ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement> &other) const
122 {
123  const bitpit::ConstProxyVector<long> &connect1 = m_connect;
124  const bitpit::ConstProxyVector<long> &connect2 = other.m_connect;
125 
126  std::size_t connectSize = connect1.size();
127  if (connectSize != connect2.size()) {
128  return false;
129  }
130 
131  int winding = m_winding * other.m_winding;
132  std::size_t offset = other.m_connectBegin - winding * m_connectBegin + 2 * connectSize;
133  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < connectSize; ++i) {
134  std::size_t k1 = i;
135  std::size_t k2 = (offset + winding * i) % connectSize;
136  if (connect1[k1] != connect2[k2]) {
137  return false;
138  }
139  }
140 
141  return true;
142 }
143 
151 template<class DerivedElement>
152 bool ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::operator!=(const ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement> &other) const
153 {
154  return !((*this) == other);
155 }
156 
171 template<class DerivedElement>
172 std::size_t ElementHalfItem<DerivedElement>::Hasher::operator()(const ElementHalfItem &item) const
173 {
174  const ConstProxyVector<long> &connectivity = item.m_connect;
175  std::size_t connectivitySize = connectivity.size();
176 
177  std::size_t hash = connectivitySize;
178  if (item.m_winding == ElementHalfItem::WINDING_NATURAL) {
179  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < connectivitySize; ++i) {
180  std::size_t k = (item.m_connectBegin + i) % connectivitySize;
181  utils::hashing::hash_combine(hash, connectivity[k]);
182  }
183  } else {
184  for (std::size_t i = connectivitySize; i > 0; --i) {
185  std::size_t k = (item.m_connectBegin + i) % connectivitySize;
186  utils::hashing::hash_combine(hash, connectivity[k]);
187  }
188  }
189 
190  return hash;
191 }
